word:
Christ's blood was our ransom, his death brings life and immortality to light. In and through Christ we are complete in every 
                                                                           1431
grace. We share his throne. O that God would give to us the divine perception to comprehend the breadth, and length, the depth and height, and to know the love of Christ that passeth knowledge, that we might be filled with the fulness of God! Then would man look upon his fellow-man as God's own purchased possession.
